original_text: He also brought two oxen, five male sheep, five male goats, and five male lambs that were less than one year old. Those animals were for the friendship offerings. That was the gift of Ahiezer, the son of Ammishaddai.
korean_text: 화목제물로 소 두 마리와 숫양 다섯 마리와 숫염소 다섯 마리와 일 년 된 어린 숫양 다섯 마리라 이는 암미삿대의 아들 아히에셀의 헌물이었더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또 수소 두 마리를 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: that were less than one year old
sentences.korean_translation: 태어난 지 일 년이 안 된 것들을

sentences.original_text: Those animals were for the friendship offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동물들은 교제 예물을 위한 것이었고

sentences.original_text: That was the gift of Ahiezer
